burger_btn_rotate_show.html: <button class="burger_btn_rotate_show _btn_listener" data-where_droper="test" type="button" aria-label="Toggle Burger Button"></button>
burger_btn_rotate_show.css: .burger_btn_rotate_show { background-color: transparent; border-left: none; border-right: none; position: relative; border-top: 4px solid #000; border-bottom: 4px solid #000; width: 30px; height: 26px; transform: rotate(0deg); transition: transform 0.5s ease, border 0.2s ease; } .burger_btn_rotate_show:before, .burger_btn_rotate_show:after { content: ''; position: absolute; width: 30px; height: 4px; background: #000; top: 40%; left: 0%; transform: rotate(0deg) translate(0%, 0%); transition: transform 0.5s ease; } .burger_btn_rotate_show[active] { border-top: 4px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-bottom: 4px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); transform: rotate(90deg); } .burger_btn_rotate_show[active]:before { transform: rotate(45deg) translate(0%, 0%); } .burger_btn_rotate_show[active]:after { transform: rotate(-45deg) translate(0%, 0%); }
burger_btn_rotate_show.js: function listener_and_dorper() {   let _btn_listener = document.querySelectorAll("._btn_listener");   _btn_listener.forEach((btn) => {     btn.addEventListener("click", () => {       let btn_dst = btn.dataset.where_droper;       if (btn.hasAttribute("active") == true) {         btn.removeAttribute('active')       } else {         btn.setAttribute('active', '');       }       if (btn_dst !== null || btn_dst !== undefined || btn_dst !== "none") {         let _this_droper = document.querySelectorAll("._this_droper");         if (_this_droper) {           _this_droper.forEach((menu) => {             let menu_dst = menu.dataset.where_listener;             if (menu_dst == btn_dst) {               if (menu.hasAttribute("active") == true) {                 menu.removeAttribute('active')               } else {                 menu.setAttribute('active', '');               }             }           });         }       }     });   }); }  export default listener_and_dorper;

burger_btn_w_change.html: <button class="burger_btn_w_change _btn_listener" data-where_droper="test" type="button" aria-label="Toggle Burger Button"></button>
burger_btn_w_change.css: .burger_btn_w_change {   background-color: transparent;   border-left: none;   border-right: none;   position: relative;   border-top: 4px solid #000;   border-bottom: 4px solid #000;   width: 30px;   height: 26px;   transform: rotate(0deg); } .burger_btn_w_change:after {   content: "";   position: absolute;   width: 30px;   height: 4px;   background: #000;   width: 100%;   top: 50%;   left: 50%;   transform: rotate(0deg) translate(-50%, -50%);   transition: width 0.5s ease; }  .burger_btn_w_change[active]:after {   width: 60%; }
burger_btn_w_change.js: function listener_and_dorper() {   let _btn_listener = document.querySelectorAll("._btn_listener");   _btn_listener.forEach((btn) => {     btn.addEventListener("click", () => {       let btn_dst = btn.dataset.where_droper;       if (btn.hasAttribute("active") == true) {         btn.removeAttribute('active')       } else {         btn.setAttribute('active', '');       }       if (btn_dst !== null || btn_dst !== undefined || btn_dst !== "none") {         let _this_droper = document.querySelectorAll("._this_droper");         if (_this_droper) {           _this_droper.forEach((menu) => {             let menu_dst = menu.dataset.where_listener;             if (menu_dst == btn_dst) {               if (menu.hasAttribute("active") == true) {                 menu.removeAttribute('active')               } else {                 menu.setAttribute('active', '');               }             }           });         }       }     });   }); }  export default listener_and_dorper;

burger_btn_w_right_change.html: <button class="burger_btn_w_right_change _btn_listener" data-where_droper="test" type="button" aria-label="Toggle Burger Button"></button>
burger_btn_w_right_change.css: .burger_btn_w_right_change {   background-color: transparent;   border-left: none;   border-right: none;   position: relative;   border-top: 4px solid #000;   border-bottom: 4px solid #000;   width: 30px;   height: 26px; } .burger_btn_w_right_change:after {   content: "";   position: absolute;   width: 30px;   height: 4px;   background: #000;   width: 100%;   top: 50%;   left: 0%;   transform: translate(0%, -50%);   transition: width 0.5s ease; }  .burger_btn_w_right_change[active]:after {   width: 60%; }
burger_btn_w_right_change.js: function listener_and_dorper() {   let _btn_listener = document.querySelectorAll("._btn_listener");   _btn_listener.forEach((btn) => {     btn.addEventListener("click", () => {       let btn_dst = btn.dataset.where_droper;       if (btn.hasAttribute("active") == true) {         btn.removeAttribute('active')       } else {         btn.setAttribute('active', '');       }       if (btn_dst !== null || btn_dst !== undefined || btn_dst !== "none") {         let _this_droper = document.querySelectorAll("._this_droper");         if (_this_droper) {           _this_droper.forEach((menu) => {             let menu_dst = menu.dataset.where_listener;             if (menu_dst == btn_dst) {               if (menu.hasAttribute("active") == true) {                 menu.removeAttribute('active')               } else {                 menu.setAttribute('active', '');               }             }           });         }       }     });   }); }  export default listener_and_dorper;
